short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display protocol (https, http, ftp, ...) from given web address

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome address bar no longer shows protocol in the address bar. This extension brings the protocol information back to you and shows you which protocol is used (i.e. https, http, ftp, ...)
